title: The Chicken
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: Help students begin to identify different parts of a chicken in the book The Chicken. Detailed photographs, simple sentences, and high-frequency words support emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and supporting details as well as to connect to prior knowledge.
reviewWords: beak, chicken, egg, feathers, feet, legs, tail, wings
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Determine the main idea and supporting details
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word the
